scripts.build: npm run build:cds && npm run build:ts && npm run cleanup:ts
scripts.build:all: npx --yes cross-var npm run build:srv && npm run build:db-com && npm run build:router  && npm run build:api && npm run build:broker
scripts.build:srv: npx --yes cross-var pack build $npm_package_config_imagePrefix/aisaas-srv --path ../../code/gen/srv --builder paketobuildpacks/builder:base --buildpack gcr.io/paketo-buildpacks/nodejs -e BP_LAUNCHPOINT=./node_modules/@sap/cds/bin/cds-serve.js
scripts.build:db-com: npx --yes cross-var pack build $npm_package_config_imagePrefix/aisaas-db-com --path ../../code/gen/db-com --builder paketobuildpacks/builder:base --buildpack gcr.io/paketo-buildpacks/nodejs -e BP_LAUNCHPOINT=./node_modules/@sap/hdi-deploy/deploy.js
scripts.build:api: npx --yes cross-var pack build $npm_package_config_imagePrefix/aisaas-api --path ../../code/gen/api --builder paketobuildpacks/builder:base --buildpack gcr.io/paketo-buildpacks/nodejs -e BP_LAUNCHPOINT=./node_modules/@sap/cds/bin/cds-serve.js
scripts.build:broker: npx --yes cross-var pack build $npm_package_config_imagePrefix/aisaas-broker --path ../../code/broker --builder paketobuildpacks/builder:base --buildpack gcr.io/paketo-buildpacks/nodejs -e BP_LAUNCHPOINT=./start.js
scripts.push:all: npx --yes cross-var npm run push:srv && npm run push:db-com && npm run push:router && npm run push:api && npm run push:broker
